CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in tNew New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 22, 1967, pg. 13, reads: "Presenting Awards - Mrs. Lois Golden, vice president of Duff's Business College and a member of the Squaws Advisory Board, presents a scholarship award to Marilyn Watkins, standing in for her sister Jean. Other awardees are from left, Sandra Ellis, Leo Woods, Jr. and Chester Chavis.  Mrs. Laura Stevenson, right, stood for her son, Loren Gloster."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Lois Golden, handing out scholarship awards to Sandra Ellis, Marilyn Watkins, standing in for sister Jean, Leo Woods Jr., Chester Chavis, and Laura Stevenson, standing in for son, Loren Gloster, posed behind drum kit, in Hilton Hotel for Squaw Club "Cotton Extravaganza"
